language.name: Tosk Albanian
language.maps: Greece and The Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

translations.name: Catholic Drita Version
translations.description: In 1994, Drita produced Dom Simon Filipaj's annotated translation based on Jerome's Vulgate and which includes the Apocrypha. The version is used by Albanian Roman Catholic churches. In this version's introduction, it claims that the Bible speaks the truth about relations between God and man but does not claim to speak accurately about other areas of human knowledge, claiming that the first chapters of Genesis are \\\"poetic compositions\\\" not meant to be viewed scientifically.
